user_query: I'm hosting a company conference in Singapore next month and I need to plan outdoor activities for the attendees. Can you give me the 16-day weather forecast for Singapore so that I can schedule the activities accordingly? Additionally, provide me with some popular news urls related to Singapore to keep the attendees informed about the local news and events happening during the conference.

TaskList.description: Retrieve the 16-day weather forecast for Singapore to aid in planning outdoor activities.
Gather popular news URLs related to Singapore to keep attendees informed about local news and events.
